unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Finding and Combining Expected Values
question_text: A hat contains $5$ slips of paper, numbered $1$ through $5$ , with a different number on each slip of paper.  Another hat contains $4$ slips of paper, numbered $20$ through $23$ , with a different number on each slip of paper.  One number is randomly drawn from each hat. What is the expected value of the sum of the numbers on the two selected pieces of paper?
